channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-2123] Fix CLI client logging
item.description: The CLI client complains about missing log4j configuration and prints too much information.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
How can I reproduce the "too much information" part mentioned in this issue?

I'm getting 

log4j:WARN No appenders could be found for logger (org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.lib.MutableMetricsFactory).
log4j:WARN Please initialize the log4j system properly.
log4j:WARN See http://logging.apache.org/log4j/1.2/faq.html#noconfig for more info.

and I'll try to fix it.

Okay .. sorry..
It seems that the "too much information" issue appears only in the hadoop1 build:

robert@robert-da /tmp/flink-0.9-SNAPSHOT % ./bin/start-local.sh
Starting Job Manager
robert@robert-da /tmp/flink-0.9-SNAPSHOT % ./bin/flink run examples/flink-java-examples-0.9-SNAPSHOT-WordCount.jar 
15/06/04 16:16:08 INFO client.CliFrontend: --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15/06/04 16:16:08 INFO client.CliFrontend:  Starting Command Line Client (Version: 0.9-SNAPSHOT, Rev:8e49e7b, Date:04.06.2015 @ 12:27:00 UTC)
15/06/04 16:16:08 INFO client.CliFrontend:  Current user: robert
15/06/04 16:16:08 INFO client.CliFrontend:  JVM: OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM - Oracle Corporation - 1.7/24.75-b04
15/06/04 16:16:08 INFO client.CliFrontend:  Maximum heap size: 3541 MiBytes
15/06/04 16:16:08 INFO client.CliFrontend:  JAVA_HOME: (not set)
15/06/04 16:16:08 INFO client.CliFrontend:  JVM Options:
15/06/04 16:16:08 INFO client.CliFrontend:     -Dlog.file=/tmp/flink-0.9-SNAPSHOT/bin/../log/flink-robert-flink-client-robert-da.log -Dlog4j.configuration=file:/tmp/flink-0.9-SNAPSHOT/bin/../conf/log4j-cli.properties -Dlogback.configurationFile=file:/tmp/flink-0.9-SNAPSHOT/bin/../conf/logback.xml
15/06/04 16:16:08 INFO client.CliFrontend:  Program Arguments:
15/06/04 16:16:08 INFO client.CliFrontend:     run
15/06/04 16:16:08 INFO client.CliFrontend:     examples/flink-java-examples-0.9-SNAPSHOT-WordCount.jar
15/06/04 16:16:08 INFO client.CliFrontend: --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15/06/04 16:16:08 INFO client.CliFrontend: Using configuration directory /tmp/flink-0.9-SNAPSHOT/bin/../conf
15/06/04 16:16:08 INFO client.CliFrontend: Trying to load configuration file
15/06/04 16:16:08 INFO client.CliFrontend: Running 'run' command.
15/06/04 16:16:08 INFO client.CliFrontend: Building program from JAR file
15/06/04 16:16:08 INFO client.CliFrontend: Starting execution of program
15/06/04 16:16:08 INFO program.Client: Starting program in interactive mode

GitHub user rmetzger opened a pull request:

https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/783

FLINK-2123 Fix log4j warnings on CliFrontend startup

  • The hadoop1 build still contained a log4j.properties file from hadoop (I guess hadoop is shipping a jar file that contains a log4j.properties file and we got it into our shaded fat jar)
  • The way JVM properties `-D` arguments were passed to `java` for `bin/flink` was different than how we do it for the other commands.
    I've tested the change on linux, with paths containing spaces. I'm currently also testing it on Windows.

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

$ git pull https://github.com/rmetzger/flink flink2123

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/783.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

This closes #783

commit f9a5133d8b8d0f624c299af7b0609db6f11d3a4a
Author: Robert Metzger <rmetzger@apache.org>
Date: 2015-06-04T15:50:24Z

FLINK-2123 Fix log4j warnings on CliFrontend startup

Github user rmetzger commented on the pull request:

https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/783#issuecomment-108963562

I've successfully tested the change on Windows/cygwin with flink installed in a path containing spaces.

Github user StephanEwen commented on the pull request:

https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/783#issuecomment-108984346

Looks good.

+1 to merge this

Github user flinkqa commented on the pull request:

https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/783#issuecomment-109125004

Tested pull request.Result:
fatal: No such remote 'totest'
fatal: 'totest' does not appear to be a git repository
fatal: The remote end hung up unexpectedly
error: pathspec 'totest/flink2123' did not match any file(s) known to git.
Running ./tools/qa-check.sh

:+1: The number of javadoc errors was 174 and is now 174
:-1: The change increases the number of compiler warnings from 634 to 647
